item.title: Clustering English Premier League Forwards and Midfielders using K-Means
item.description: The English Premier League is arguably the most difficult football league in the world. With the right use of tactics and players, any team can create upsets in the Premier League. Teams are always trying to recruit the next big star, the hidden gems, or just anyone who can successfully fill a role with the least amount of resources. In this demo, I will use K-Means clustering to group players based on their shot and goal creating performance metrics.
